header.headertext: AMENDMENT TO BE MOVED ON REPORT

text.quote: 000: Clause 46, page 49, line 2, at end insert—

“(3A) Before an order is made under subsection (3) the Payment Systems Regulator must consider any representations made by the payment service provider about the risks to which the payment service provider may be exposed as a result of the order.

(3B) The Payment Systems Regulator may revoke an order made under subsection (3) if it is satisfied that compliance with the order would expose the payment service provider to risks which it is not reasonable for the payment service provider to bear.”
